title: Person of Interest - Behind the Machine
author: CBS
comment: The way Finch tell us: You are being watched.Amazing.
Hard to believe that Jar Jar Abrams made this amazing series .... then went on to ruin Star Wars AND Star Trek
This is great.  :D  I mean... You know.  xD lol

It can work both ways - proving that someone did something wrong, or proving that they didn't.  But the old rules apply - if you are not doing anything wrong, you have nothing to worry about.  I like the cruiser cams in police cars - it keeps most cops on the up and up.  But I like this show a lot.  It is imaginative and always interesting.
description: You are being watched. The machine sees everything. The government wouldn't act so Reese and Finch did. Go Behind the Machine with 'Person of Interest' Executive Producers J.J. Abrams, Jonathan Nolan, and Greg Plageman. Watch Thursdays 9/8c ONLY CBS!
